subject: Re: [junit] RepeatedTest - SwingUI
msgSnippet: ... I remember that a bug report pointed out a similar problem.  If you re not using the 3.7 version, you can upgrade.  The version 4.0 is currently under
messageBody:
> However , we have noted that the green tick on the test box in
> the "Test Hierarchy" window is never displayed and we can't figure
> out why.

I remember that a bug report pointed out a similar problem. If you're
not using the 3.7 version, you can upgrade. The version 4.0 is
currently under development so if you are patient...

-Vladimir
